sentences.en: Bad or malformed serialization info for the message object.
sentences.cn: 该消息对象的序列化信息错误或格式不正确.

sentences.en: Conclusion. There were morphologic variations of the posterior components of malformed vertebrae.
sentences.cn: 结论: 脊柱畸形的后部存在着形态学的变异.

sentences.en: If the heart be malformed, the condition may be ascertained by the X - ray examination.
sentences.cn: 如果心脏呈畸形, 这种情况即可用 爱克斯光 检查确定.

sentences.en: Internal compiler error: code generator received malformed input.
sentences.cn: 内部编译器错误: 代码生成器收到格式不正确的输入.

sentences.en: Many animals died during these experiments, including ones malformed at birth.
sentences.cn: 许多动物死于这些试验, 这当中包括产下的畸形胎.

sentences.en: More rarely, the tubes have been malformed from birth.
sentences.cn: 这些管状器官先天畸形的现象更加少见。

sentences.en: Some medical historians have implicated kidney disease because of Mozart's malformed ear.
sentences.cn: 一些医学史家曾暗示是肾脏疾病,因为莫扎特的耳朵有些畸形.

sentences.en: The average number of packets containing malformed data received per second.
sentences.cn: 平均每秒收到的含有错误格式的数据的数据包数.

sentences.en: The default is to not display malformed answers.
sentences.cn: 对于那些有问题的响应是否显示,默认是不显示.

sentences.en: The number of packets containing malformed data received.
sentences.cn: 收到的含有错误格式的数据的数据包数.

sentences.en: The runtime ignores entire configuration file if it contains malformed XML.
sentences.cn: 如果配置文件包含格式错误的XML,运行时将忽略整个配置文件.

sentences.en: The thick , fleshy leaves are greatly enlarged and malformed.
sentences.cn: 肥厚多汁的叶子,迅速扩大成为畸形叶.
不明白是不是输入的格式有问题.

sentences.en: There was an error reading the log malformed requests property.
sentences.cn: 读取“格式不正确的日志请求”属性出错.

sentences.en: There was an error writing the log malformed requests property.
sentences.cn: 写入“格式不正确的日志请求”属性出错.

trans.tran_en: if a part of someone’s body is malformed, it is badly formed
